name: Furry Ball!
description:
This short game has been created for the 2022 GDevelop Game Jam #2. 

It is only a short project as I have to go halfway through but I hope these first couple of levels create some enjoyment. 

Your task is to progress through platformer levels and use your pet to help you do so.   

After the game jam period is over and I am back, I will finish off this game and add some more levels :)  

Hopefully, I can implement some more updates soon.
